content: to 2nd chain to join 168 round 11 ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet into same st ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 4dc 2dc into next st ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 4dc 11 times slip_stitch to 2nd round 15 chain to join 132 ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet into same st ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 3 times 2dc into next st ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 3 times 11 times sl st to 2nd chain to join 180 round 12 ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet into same st 2dc ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 3dc 2dc into next st 2dc ch1 sk1 3dc ch1 sk1 3dc 11 times sl st to 2nd chain to join 144 original design by heidi heinrichs © 2020 all rights reserved 3 säde placemats round 16 ch1 count as a frst single_crochet 5sc 2sc into next ch1-space 3sc 2sc into next ch1-space 10sc 2sc into next ch1-space 3sc 2sc into next ch1-space 11 times 4sc slip_stitch to frst chain to join 204 round 17 note remember to crochet this round very loosely a flatter result is more likely to be achieved by going up 1 or 2 crochet hook sizes ch1 doesen t count as a st crab st into every other st cut the yarn fasten_off 102 finishing sew all yarn ends in the placemats shown in the pattern are only steam blocked to fnish off original design by heidi heinrichs © 2020 all rights reserved 5
